data.name: pegasus_core|Button_Name_Nanoswarm_Button
data.tooltip:
A swarm of nanobots will augment a friendly unit increasing their armor by <d ref="duckiesHeroExoBeamNanoswarm_Buff.modifiers[0].amount" style="Bold"/>. Effect is reversed for hostile units.

Nanoswarm lasts for <d ref="duckiesHeroExoBeamNanoswarm_Buff.duration"/> seconds.
